name: Chemical Peel
description: A treatment that uses acid solution to remove dead skin cells, revealing smoother, brighter skin underneath.

name: Hydrafacial
description: A multi-step facial treatment that cleanses, exfoliates, extracts, and hydrates the skin.

name: Microneedling
description: Creates tiny punctures in the skin to stimulate collagen production and improve texture.

name: LED Light Therapy
description: Uses different wavelengths of light to treat various skin concerns without downtime.

name: Botox
description: Injectable treatment that temporarily relaxes facial muscles to reduce wrinkles.

name: Dermal Fillers
description: Injectable gel that restores volume and fullness to the face.

name: Laser Hair Removal
description: Permanent hair reduction using concentrated light beams.

name: Scalp Treatment
description: Intensive treatment to nourish the scalp and promote healthy hair growth.

name: PRP Hair Therapy
description: Platelet-rich plasma injections to stimulate hair follicles and promote growth.

name: Keratin Treatment
description: Smoothing treatment that repairs damaged hair and reduces frizz.

name: Gel Manicure
description: Long-lasting nail polish that cures under UV light.

name: Nail Strengthening Treatment
description: Specialized treatment to repair and strengthen weak, brittle nails.

name: Body Wrap
description: Detoxifying treatment that wraps the body in nourishing ingredients.

name: Radiofrequency Body Treatment
description: Uses radio waves to heat tissue and stimulate collagen production.

name: Lymphatic Drainage Massage
description: Gentle massage technique to reduce fluid retention and puffiness.

name: Eye Treatment
description: Targeted treatment for the delicate under-eye area.

name: Vitamin C Facial
description: Brightening facial using vitamin C to even skin tone and add radiance.

name: Oxygen Facial
description: Infuses oxygen and nutrients into the skin for instant glow.

name: Deep Cleansing Facial
description: Thorough cleansing treatment with extraction to clear pores.

name: IPL Photofacial
description: Intense pulsed light treatment for sun damage and pigmentation.
